D

damage - Variable in class main.Monster
A int variable contains the amount of damage this monster deals
day - Variable in class main.MainWindow
an int variable used to keep track of how long the game has gone on for, can't be greater than gameLength
daysFainted - Variable in class main.Monster
An int variable contains how many days in a row this monster has fainted in battle
description - Variable in class main.Purchasable
The description for the monster or item in the shop
disabled - Variable in class main.MainWindow
A boolean variable, used to keep track if certain JButtons have been disabled
displayItems(GameWindow) - Method in class main.Shop
a method that will print out the available items in the shop
displayMonsters(GameWindow) - Method in class main.Shop
a method that will print out the available monsters in the shop
dmgIncrease - Variable in class main.BattleWindow
An int variable used to contain the amount of extra damage an enemy monster will have, if hard is true
done - Variable in class main.Battle
A variable of boolean data type is used to see if the user has already fought this battle
drinkPotion(Monster, Player) - Method in class main.AttackPotion
a method that will allow the player to drink the potion thereby removing it from the player's inventory and adding the affects to the monster, takes an Monster parameter monster, Player parameter as its parameters, returns void
drinkPotion(Monster, Player) - Method in class main.MaxHealthPotion
a method that will allow the player to drink the potion thereby removing it from the player's inventory and adding the affects to the monster, takes an Monster parameter monster, Player parameter as its parameters, returns void
drinkPotion(Monster, Player, GameWindow) - Method in class main.HealthPotion
a method that will allow the player to drink the potion thereby removing it from the player's inventory and adding the affects to the monster, takes an Monster parameter monster, Player parameter, GameWindow parameter window as its parameters, returns void
drinkPotion(Monster, Player, GameWindow) - Method in class main.Items
An instance method which all subclasses of Items implement, takes an Monster parameter monster, Player parameter, GameWindow parameter window as its parameters, returns void

a method that will allow the player to drink the potion thereby removing it from the player's inventory and adding the affects to the monster, takes an Monster parameter monster, Player parameter, GameWindow parameter window as its parameters, returns void
